Header: Mahindananda Aluthgamage accepts the mistakes done by them
Content: TheJoint Opposition held a media briefing today. At this news conference they mentioned that they accepted the mistake done by attacking demonstrations. Parliamentarian Mahindananda Aluthgamage said that very clearly they had shortcomings during their rule and as such they had to go home. There were also unfortunate incidents committed by the military and they accept this too.
